connect_launcher: You need to run your AzzaFortysix Mod Launcher if you want to edit your key bindings for a game.
tldr: This functionality allows you to toggle mods on and off using a key press, change an option or otherwise interact with the game via the press of a button.
tldr_alias: Use this section to assign an action or an action alias to a key.
key_pressed: When the '{{selectedKey}}' key is initially pressed
key_hold: While the '{{selectedKey}}' key is held down
please_valid_detection: Please select a valid key detection type.
describe_toggle: Toggle the '{{selectedOption}}' option in the '{{selectedMod}}' mod.
describe_set: Set the value of the '{{selectedOption}}' option in the '{{selectedMod}}' mod to '{{selectedOptionAction2}}'.
describe_increase: Increase the value of the '{{selectedOption}}' option in the '{{selectedMod}}' mod by '{{selectedOptionAction2}}'.
describe_decrease: Decrease the value of the '{{selectedOption}}' option in the '{{selectedMod}}' mod by '{{selectedOptionAction2}}'.
describe_invoke: Press the '{{selectedOption}}' button in the '{{selectedMod}}' mod.
describe_unknown: Set the '{{selectedOption}}' option in the {{selectedMod}} mod to '{{selectedOptionAction}}'.
label_change_option: Change an Option / Press a button
